name: TweakOS
short_description:
Welcome to TweakOS! 

Browse all files to find your version!!!

"WILMA" 
----------
Wilma is a CrunchBang-spin..., very close to the original... Only in 64-bit as of now..

"DOVE" 
----------
Dove is a VERY light openbox release.
Available in 64-bit, and 32-bit non-pae(old pc's).

The MAIN RELEASE below will also get a codename for the next build, and I will probably replace wicd-gtk with network-manager, and also slim down the iso.... More about that later.

Main release: tweakos-ob-1.0
(Debian Stable-Openbox)

This release is currently available in both 32 and 64-bit versions. 

Use at own risk. I am in no way responsible for anything that might be caused by someone using the software found in these project-pages. 

The original licensing for all Debian-packages still apply, and all my compilations are licensed under gnu gpl v3. see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>
summary: Custom Lightweight Linux. Mainly Debian and Openbox.
